workflow.name: Edit & deliver images with DALL-E 2, Google Drive & Telegram messaging
workflow.description:
## üé® AI Image Editor with Form Upload + Telegram Delivery üöÄ

Who‚Äôs it for? üë•

This workflow is built for content creators, social media managers, designers, and agencies who need fast, AI-powered image editing without the hassle. Whether you're batch-editing for clients or spicing up personal projects, this tool gets it done ‚Äî effortlessly.

## What it does üõ†Ô∏è

A seamless pipeline that:

üì• Accepts uploads + prompts via a clean form
‚òÅÔ∏è Saves images to Google Drive automatically
üß† Edits images with OpenAI‚Äôs image API
üìÅ Converts results to downloadable PNGs
üì¨ Delivers the final image instantly via Telegram
Perfect for AI-enhanced workflows that need speed, structure, and simplicity.

## How it works ‚öôÔ∏è

User Uploads: Fill a form with an image + editing prompt
Cloud Save: Auto-upload to your Google Drive folder
AI Editing: OpenAI processes the image with your prompt
Convert & Format: Image saved as PNG
Telegram Delivery: Final result sent straight to your chat üí¨
You‚Äôll need ‚úÖ

üîë OpenAI API key
üìÇ Google Drive OAuth2 setup
ü§ñ Telegram bot token & chat ID
‚öôÔ∏è n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)
Setup in 4 Easy Steps üõ†Ô∏è

## 1. Connect APIs

Add OpenAI, Google Drive, and Telegram credentials to n8n
Store keys securely (avoid hardcoding!)
## 2. Configure Settings

Set Google Drive folder ID
Add Telegram chat ID
Tweak image size (default: 1024√ó1024)
## 3. Deploy the Form

Add a Webhook Trigger node
Test with a sample image
Share the form link with users üéØ
4. Fine-Tune Variables
In the Set node, customize:

üìê Image size
üìÅ Folder path
üì≤ Delivery options
‚è±Ô∏è Timeout duration
Want to customize more? üéõÔ∏è

üñºÔ∏è Image Settings

Change size (e.g. 512x512 or 2048x2048)
Update the model (when new versions drop)
üìÇ Storage

Auto-organize files by date/category
Add dynamic file names using n8n expressions
üì§ Delivery

Swap Telegram with Slack, email, Discord
Add multiple delivery channels
Include image prompt or metadata in messages
üìù Form Upgrades

Add fields for advanced editing
Validate file types (e.g. PNG/JPEG only)
Show a progress bar for long edits
‚ö° Advanced Features

Add error handling or retry flows
Support batch editing
Include approvals or watermarking before delivery
‚ö†Ô∏è Notes & Best Practices
‚úÖ Check OpenAI credit balance
üñºÔ∏è Test with different image sizes/types
‚è±Ô∏è Adjust timeout settings for larger files
üîê Always secure your API keys

values.placeholder: Describe the edits you want (e.g., 'remove background', 'add sunglasses', 'change to winter scene')

parameters.formDescription: Upload your image and describe the edits you want to make. Our AI will process your image and deliver the results instantly via Telegram.

parameters.content:
# üé® AI Image Editor Workflow

**Created by:** David Olusola

## üìã What This Workflow Does

This automation creates a complete AI image editing pipeline that:
- ‚úÖ Provides a user-friendly web form for image uploads
- ‚úÖ Stores original images in Google Drive
- ‚úÖ Processes images through OpenAI's image editing API  
- ‚úÖ Delivers edited results instantly via Telegram

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Requirements

1. **OpenAI API Key** - Add to HTTP Request credentials
2. **Google Drive OAuth** - For file storage
3. **Telegram Bot** - For result delivery
4. **Configuration Variables** - Update the yellow node with your IDs

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration Steps

1. **Update Configuration Variables node:**
   - `google_drive_folder_id`: Your Google Drive folder ID
   - `telegram_chat_id`: Your Telegram chat ID
   - `image_size`: Desired output size (default: 1024x1024)
   - `openai_model`: AI model to use (default: dall-e-2)

2. **Set up credentials:**
   - OpenAI API in "AI Image Editor" node
   - Google Drive OAuth in both Drive nodes
   - Telegram Bot in "Send to Telegram" node

3. **Test the workflow:**
   - Deploy and get the form URL
   - Upload a test image with editing prompt
   - Check Telegram for the result

## üéØ Example Prompts
- "Remove the background"
- "Add sunglasses to the person"
- "Change the sky to sunset"
- "Make it look like a cartoon"

## üîß Customization Options
- Change image dimensions in config
- Modify file naming conventions
- Add error handling nodes
- Implement batch processing
- Add multiple delivery channels

üí° **STEP 1: Form Submission**

User uploads image and provides editing instructions through web form. The form validates file type and requires both image and prompt.

‚öôÔ∏è **STEP 2: Configuration**

Sets up all workflow variables that users need to customize. Update these values before first use!

üìÅ **STEP 3: Backup Storage**

Uploads original image to Google Drive with timestamp for organization and backup purposes.

üì• **STEP 4: Prepare for AI**

Downloads the image from Drive to prepare it for OpenAI processing in the correct format.

üé® **STEP 5: AI Magic**

Sends image and prompt to OpenAI's image editing API. Uses DALL-E model for high-quality results.

üîÑ **STEP 6: File Conversion**

Converts the AI response to a downloadable PNG file with proper naming and metadata.

üì± **STEP 7: Instant Delivery**

Sends the edited image to Telegram with prompt details and timestamp for easy identification.

user.name: David Olusola
user.bio: I design enterprise-grade automation systems that eliminate bottlenecks, cut manual work by 70%+, and unlock millions in lost revenue opportunities. My clients ‚Äî typically achieve 5‚Äì10x ROI within the first 90 days. Currently partnering with select high-growth companies ready to scale faster with AI automation.  david@daexai.com
